mapper.select: SELECT uc.class_id AS classId, u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, cs.status AS status, cs.description AS memo, #{classDate} AS classDate FROM user_class uc INNER JOIN user u ON uc.user_id = u.user_id AND u.user_type = 'STUDENT' LEFT JOIN attendance cs ON u.user_id = cs.user_id AND cs.class_date = #{classDate} WHERE uc.class_id = #{classId}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO attendance ( user_id, class_id, class_date, status, chg_check_date, description ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{classId}, #{classDate}, #{status}, #{chgCheckDate}, #{memo} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status=#{status}, chg_check_date=#{chgCheckDate}, description=#{memo}
